channel.title: +Rep'ing. 2 questions
channel.description:
I'll rep for anyone helpful.
a. How do I send a message to all online staff members? b. How can I make something write to a file? (I want to make logs)

item.title: +Rep'ing. 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:13, topic:257176”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=339561.msg2633680#msg2633680 date=1232346590]

Add this;

void sM(String str, int priv) { for (Player element : handler.players) { client p = (client) element; if (p == null || p.disconnected || playerRights < priv) { return; } p.sM(str); } }

Usage;

	sM("This message will be sent to all online players with moderator+ privalages.", 1);

It’s supposed to be playerRights >= priv, `Rich.
Jayden, just declare the method in the Player or Client class and call it to send a message to staff members.
[/quote]

No, `Rich is right, it means; if player rights are lower then priv, return;, He’s making it return if the rights are lower.

[quote]
if (p == null || p.disconnected || playerRights < priv) {
return;
}
[/quote][/quote]
osht
Please excuse me, I can’t think at all right now. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: +Rep'ing. 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:12, topic:257176”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=339561.msg2632827#msg2632827 date=1232303948]
Add this;

void sM(String str, int priv) { for (Player element : handler.players) { client p = (client) element; if (p == null || p.disconnected || playerRights < priv) { return; } p.sM(str); } }

Usage;

	sM("This message will be sent to all online players with moderator+ privalages.", 1);

[/quote]
It’s supposed to be playerRights >= priv, `Rich.
Jayden, just declare the method in the Player or Client class and call it to send a message to staff members.[/quote]

No, `Rich is right, it means; if player rights are lower then priv, return;, He’s making it return if the rights are lower.

if (p == null || p.disconnected || [b]playerRights < priv) {[/b] [b]return;[/b] }

Read full topic

item.title: +Rep'ing. 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:

[quote="`Rich, post:7, topic:257176"]Add this;

void sM(String str, int priv) { for (Player element : handler.players) { client p = (client) element; if (p == null || p.disconnected || playerRights < priv) { return; } p.sM(str); } }

Usage;

	sM("This message will be sent to all online players with moderator+ privalages.", 1);

It’s supposed to be playerRights >= priv, `Rich.
Jayden, just declare the method in the Player or Client class and call it to send a message to staff members.

item.title: +Rep'ing. 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

B, BufferedWriter.

    private boolean log(String text) {
        try {
            BufferedWriter writer = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/YOURFILENAME.txt", true));
            writer.write(text);
            writer.close();
            return true;
        } catch (IOException e) {
            return false;
        }
    }

[quote="`Rich, post:7, topic:257176"]Add this;

void sM(String str, int priv) { for (Player element : handler.players) { client p = (client) element; if (p == null || p.disconnected || playerRights < priv) { return; } p.sM(str); } }

Usage;

	sM("This message will be sent to all online players with moderator+ privalages.", 1);

Can i ask why you don’t put public, private etc in front of the method?

Read full topic
